9.content:
## Link
click on `gcp.project.id` or on `topic_id` + **[↗] Open with** + **Cloud**

35.title: Topic
35.query:
timeseries{ send_request_count=sum(`cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_request_count`)}, 
  by:{topic_id, gcp.project.id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
 //|filter project_id!=""
 |fields  gcp.project.id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`, topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`,  `send_request (sum)`=arraySum(send_request_count)
 |sort `send_request (sum)` desc
 |limit toLong($top)

36.title: Publish message operations by Topic (sum)
36.query:
timeseries  send_message_operation_count=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_message_operation_count), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic` }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arraySum(send_message_operation_count) desc
| limit toLong($top)

37.title: Publish requests by Topic (sum)
37.query:
timeseries  send_request_count=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_request_count), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic` }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arraySum(send_request_count) desc
| limit toLong($top)

38.title: Topic updates (sum)
38.query:
timeseries  config_updates_count=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.config_updates_count), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic` }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arraySum(config_updates_count) desc
| limit toLong($top)

39.title: Publish message size (avg)
39.query:
timeseries  message_sizes=avg(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.message_sizes), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic` }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arrayAvg(message_sizes) desc
| limit toLong($top)

40.title: Unacked bytes by Topic (avg)
40.query:
timeseries  unacked_bytes_by_region=avg(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.unacked_bytes_by_region), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arrayAvg(unacked_bytes_by_region) desc
| limit toLong($top)

41.title: Retained acked messages by region (avg)
41.query:
timeseries  num_retained_acked_messages=avg(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.num_retained_acked_messages_by_region), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic` }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arrayAvg(num_retained_acked_messages) desc
| limit toLong($top)

42.title: Topic byte cost (sum)
42.query:
timeseries  byte_cost.count=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.byte_cost.count), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic` }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arraySum(byte_cost.count) desc
| limit toLong($top)

43.title: Retained acked bytes by region (avg)
43.query:

| sort arrayAvg(retained_acked_bytes_by_region) desc
| limit toLong($top)

| sort arrayAvg(oldest_retained_acked_message_age_by_region) desc
| limit toLong($top)

45.title: Oldest unacked message age by region [s] (avg)
45.query:

| sort arrayAvg(oldest_unacked_message_age_by_region) desc
| limit toLong($top)

46.title: Unacked messages by region (avg)
46.query:
timeseries  num_unacked_messages_by_region=avg(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.num_unacked_messages_by_region), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arrayAvg(num_unacked_messages_by_region) desc
| limit toLong($top)

47.title: StreamingPull message operations (sum)
47.query:
timeseries  pull_message_operation_count=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.subscription.pull_message_operation_count), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic` }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arraySum(pull_message_operation_count) desc
| limit toLong($top)

48.title: Failed pull request count (sum)
48.query:
timeseries  sum=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_message_operation_count), by: { response_code,topic_id }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| filter response_code!="success"
| fields `response_code|topic_id`=concat(response_code," | ",topic_id), send_message_operation_count=arraySum(sum)
| sort send_message_operation_count desc
| limit toLong($top)

72.title: Failed publish requests (sum)
72.query:
timeseries  send_request_count=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_request_count), by: { response_code, topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| filter response_code!="success"
| sort arraySum(send_request_count) desc
| limit toLong($top)

74.title: Publish requests (sum)
74.query:
timeseries  sum=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_request_count), by: { response_code, topic_id}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| fields `response_code|topic_id`=concat(response_code," | ",topic_id), send_request_count=arraySum(sum)
| sort send_request_count desc
| limit toLong($top)

77.title: Failed publish message operations (sum)
77.query:
timeseries  send_message_operation_count=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_message_operation_count), by: { response_code, topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
//| filter response_code!="success"
| sort arraySum(send_message_operation_count) desc
| limit toLong($top)

78.title: Publish message operations (sum)
78.query:
timeseries  sum=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_message_operation_count), by: { response_code,topic_id }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| fields `response_code|topic_id`=concat(response_code," | ",topic_id), send_message_operation_count=arraySum(sum)
| sort send_message_operation_count desc
| limit toLong($top)

79.title: Subscription
79.query:
timeseries{ 
  pull_request_count=sum(`cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.subscription.pull_request_count`)  }, 
  by:{topic_id, gcp.project.id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
 //|filter project_id!=""
 |fields  gcp.project.id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`, topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`,   `pull_request (sum)`=arraySum(pull_request_count)
 |sort `pull_request (sum)` desc
 |limit toLong($top)

80.title: Response code topic (sum)
80.query:
timeseries  sum=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_request_count), by: { response_code }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| fields response_code, arraySum(sum)

81.title: Response code subscription (sum()
81.query:
timeseries  sum=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_message_operation_count), by: { response_code }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| fields  response_code, arraySum(sum)

84.title: Pull request (sum)
84.query:
timeseries  pull_request_count=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.subscription.pull_request_count), by: { topic_id, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:pubsub_topic`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| sort arraySum(pull_request_count) desc
| limit toLong($top)

85.title: Failed publish requests (sum)
85.query:
timeseries  sum=sum(cloud.gcp.pubsub_googleapis_com.topic.send_request_count), by: { response_code, topic_id }, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| filter response_code!="success"
| fields `response_code|topic_id`=concat(response_code," | ",topic_id), send_request_count=arraySum(sum)
| sort send_request_count desc
| limit toLong($top)

86.content:
Pub/Sub is an asynchronous and scalable messaging service that decouples services producing messages from services processing those messages.  

GCP metrics are filtered by `gcp_project_id`, splitted by some dimension(s) and aggregated by 
- `sum` = sum of period and the other dimensions (example `count`), or
- `avg` = average over the period and over the other dimensions (example `latency`).
